Name: Adorned Unagi
Desc: A slender, amphibious fish that has the peculiar habit of warming itself up at shallows or sandbanks.\nThe lovely meat of the unagi has a unique flavor when grilled, and is a much-beloved delicacy in Inazuma.\nMoreover, after a period of time in a hospitable environment such as the Realm Within, the Unagi's character will become mild to the point of dullness.
